edu.vt.middleware.ldap.search
Class SearchExecutor

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.middleware.ldap.search.SearchExecutor

public class SearchExecutor
extends java.lang.Object

SearchExecuter contains the basic methods necessary for performing a Ldap query.
